sentences.chinese: 叔帶之時，周幽王無道，去周如晉，事晉文侯，始建趙氏于晉國。
sentences.literal: In Shu Dai's time, Zhou You Wang was without the way. He left Zhou and went to Jin, served Jin Wen Hou, and began establishing the Zhao clan in the Jin state.
sentences.idiomatic: In Shu Dai's time, King You of Zhou was tyrannical. He left Zhou and went to Jin, served Marquis Wen of Jin, and began establishing the Zhao clan in the Jin state.

sentences.chinese: 自叔帶以下，趙宗益興，五世而（生）［至］趙夙。
sentences.literal: From Shu Dai below, the Zhao clan increasingly prospered. After five generations it reached Zhao Su.
sentences.idiomatic: From Shu Dai onward, the Zhao lineage grew increasingly prominent. After five generations it reached Zhao Su.

sentences.chinese: 趙夙，晉獻公之十六年伐霍、魏、耿，而趙夙為將伐霍。
sentences.literal: Zhao Su, in Jin Xian Gong's sixteenth year, attacked Huo, Wei, and Geng. Zhao Su was the general who attacked Huo.
sentences.idiomatic: Zhao Su, in Duke Xian of Jin's sixteenth year, attacked Huo, Wei, and Geng. Zhao Su was the general who attacked Huo.

sentences.literal: Huo gong Qiu fled to Qi.
sentences.idiomatic: Lord Huo Qiu fled to Qi.

sentences.chinese: 使趙夙召霍君於齊，復之，以奉霍太山之祀，晉復穰。
sentences.literal: They sent Zhao Su to summon the Huo lord from Qi and restore him, to conduct the Huo Tai Shan sacrifices. Jin again became bountiful.
sentences.idiomatic: They sent Zhao Su to summon the lord of Huo from Qi and restore him, to conduct the Huo Tai Shan sacrifices. Jin again became bountiful.

sentences.literal: Jin Xian Gong granted Zhao Su Geng.
sentences.idiomatic: Duke Xian of Jin granted Zhao Su Geng.

sentences.chinese: 夙生共孟，當魯閔公之元年也。
sentences.literal: Su gave birth to Gong Meng, during Lu Min Gong's first year.
sentences.idiomatic: Su fathered Gong Meng, during the first year of Duke Min of Lu.

sentences.literal: Gong Meng gave birth to Zhao Shuai, styled Zi Yu.
sentences.idiomatic: Gong Meng fathered Zhao Shuai, styled Zi Yu.

sentences.chinese: 卜事公子重耳，吉，即事重耳。
sentences.literal: He divined serving gong zi Chong Er. It was auspicious, so he served Chong Er.
sentences.idiomatic: He consulted the oracle about serving Prince Chong Er. It was auspicious, so he served Chong Er.

sentences.chinese: 重耳以驪姬之亂亡奔翟，趙衰從。
sentences.literal: Chong Er, because of the Li Ji chaos, fled to Di. Zhao Shuai followed.
sentences.idiomatic: Chong Er, because of the Li Ji disturbances, fled to the Di. Zhao Shuai followed him.

sentences.chinese: 翟伐廧咎如，得二女，翟以其少女妻重耳，長女妻趙衰而生盾。
sentences.literal: Di attacked Mao Jiu Ru and obtained two women. Di married the younger daughter to Chong Er and the elder daughter to Zhao Shuai, who gave birth to Dun.
sentences.idiomatic: The Di attacked Mao Jiu Ru and obtained two women. The Di married the younger daughter to Chong Er and the elder daughter to Zhao Shuai, who gave birth to Dun.

sentences.chinese: 初，重耳在晉時，趙衰妻亦生趙同、趙括、趙嬰齊。
sentences.literal: Initially, when Chong Er was in Jin, Zhao Shuai's wife also gave birth to Zhao Tong, Zhao Kuo, and Zhao Ying Qi.

sentences.chinese: 趙衰從重耳出亡，凡十九年，得反國。
sentences.literal: Zhao Shuai followed Chong Er in his flight abroad. Altogether nineteen years, he obtained return to the country.

sentences.chinese: 重耳為晉文公，趙衰為原大夫，居原，任國政。
sentences.literal: Chong Er became Jin Wen Gong. Zhao Shuai became the Yuan grandee, resided at Yuan, and managed the state's governance.

sentences.chinese: 文公所以反國及霸，多趙衰計策，語在晉事中。
sentences.literal: The reason Wen Gong returned to the country and achieved hegemony was largely due to Zhao Shuai's strategies. This is spoken of in the Jin affairs.
